mapper.insert: insert into cu_notice (title, category, content, created_time) values(#{title}, #{category}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select * from cu_notice order by id DESC limit #{page}, 10
select n.*, f.uuid_filename, f.origin_filename from cu_notice as n left join cu_notice_file as f on n.id = f.notice_id where n.id = #{id}
select id, category, title, created_time, views from cu_notice order by id desc limit 5
select * from cu_notice where title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by id desc limit #{page}, 10
select * from cu_notice where title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by id desc limit #{page}, 10
select count(id) from cu_notice where title like concat('%', #{keyword},'%')
select count(id) from cu_notice where title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
